channel.title: The Pipe - The Best Self-Published eBooks
channel.description:
A site I launched a few days ago, *[The Pipe][1]* is a curated list of the best self-published design, technology, and business ebooks I've stumbled across lately.
Seems new ones are popping up all the time, so if you have a book that isn't on the site I'd love to hear about it:
http://thepipe.io/suggest
Thanks!
[1]: http://thepipe.io
